Items.Name: Health Potion
Items.Description: A murky red liquid in a stoppered vial. Smells terrible. Works anyway.

Items.Name: Large Health Potion
Items.Description: A generous dose of the murky healing brew. Double the smell, double the effect.

Items.Name: Iron Sword
Items.Description: A battered blade, nicked from hard use. It has drawn blood before and will draw it again.

Items.Name: Leather Armor
Items.Description: Cured hide stitched with coarse thread. Won't stop a greatsword, but it's better than nothing.

Items.Name: Rusty Sword
Items.Description: A pitted blade eaten through by rust. It still has an edge, after a fashion.

Items.Name: Bone Fragment
Items.Description: Shards gnawed from something that once walked these halls. A grim remedy, but a remedy nonetheless.

Items.Name: Troll Hide
Items.Description: Thick, warty hide stripped from a troll. It stinks, but blades glance off it admirably.

Items.Name: Dark Blade
Items.Description: Forged in shadow and quenched in something cold. The metal drinks in light and gives nothing back.

Items.Name: Knight's Armor
Items.Description: Heavy plate bearing the dents of many battles. Whoever wore this last did not walk out. You might.

Items.Name: Boss Key
Items.Description: Cold iron, slick with something you'd rather not examine. It fits the lock ahead.

Items.Name: Minor Healing Potion
Items.Description: A small vial of watery red tincture. Barely enough to patch a scratch, but better than nothing.

Items.Name: Antidote
Items.Description: A bitter green liquid that neutralises toxins. Tastes awful. Feels worse going down.

Items.Name: Torch
Items.Description: A pitch-soaked rag wrapped around a stick. Pushes back the dark for a little while.

Items.Name: Bandage
Items.Description: Strips of linen stiff with old blood. Not sterile by any measure, but wounds have been bound with worse.

Items.Name: Greater Healing Potion
Items.Description: A deep crimson draught, thick and warm. Knits flesh and bone with alarming speed.

Items.Name: Elixir of Speed
Items.Description: A fizzing amber vial that makes the world slow. Your limbs feel impossibly light.

Items.Name: Smoke Bomb
Items.Description: A clay sphere packed with choking powder. Throw it and run. Try not to breathe in.

Items.Name: Mana Draught
Items.Description: A cool blue liquid that hums faintly. Restores focus and arcane reserves in an instant.

Items.Name: Elixir of Fortitude
Items.Description: A bronze-hued potion that hardens skin like iron. Pain becomes a distant memory for a time.

Items.Name: Phoenix Feather
Items.Description: A single ember-warm feather from an immortal bird. Channels the fire of rebirth into your wounds.

Items.Name: Scroll of Power
Items.Description: Ancient runes burn away as you read them, flooding your body with raw arcane force.

Items.Name: Regeneration Tonic
Items.Description: A viscous silver liquid that works slowly but thoroughly. Your body begins to knit itself back together.

Items.Name: Rusty Dagger
Items.Description: A short blade eaten by oxidisation. The edge is barely there, but it still finds gaps in armour.

Items.Name: Bone Club
Items.Description: A femur lashed to a grip of hide. Crude, heavy, and effective in a grim sort of way.

Items.Name: Worn Spear
Items.Description: A shaft of cracked wood tipped with a blunted iron head. The reach is the only thing going for it.

Items.Name: Iron Hatchet
Items.Description: A woodcutter's hatchet pressed into violent service. The grip is wrapped in fresh cord. That's promising.

Items.Name: Silver Rapier
Items.Description: A slender blade of polished silver. Quick, precise, and hungry for a vital spot.

Items.Name: Enchanted Axe
Items.Description: Runic glyphs run along the haft. The blade hums when it cleaves the air, hungry and eager.

Items.Name: Crossbow
Items.Description: A compact steel-spanned crossbow with a half-loaded quarrel. Distance becomes your friend.

Items.Name: Warlord's Maul
Items.Description: A two-handed iron maul with a head the size of a melon. Subtlety is not its style.

Items.Name: Shadow Blade
Items.Description: Forged from crystallised shadow. It cuts through armour like smoke through a keyhole.

Items.Name: Dragon Fang
Items.Description: A tooth from a dragon's upper jaw, sharpened to a serrated point and hafted in bone. Still warm.

Items.Name: Arcane Staff
Items.Description: A carved staff that crackles with stored lightning. Channels arcane force through the wielder's will.

Items.Name: Starfall Blade
Items.Description: Hammered from a fallen meteorite. The blade sings at high speed and leaves cold light in its wake.

Items.Name: Padded Tunic
Items.Description: Layers of rough linen quilted together. Not much, but it'll soften a glancing blow.

Items.Name: Wooden Shield
Items.Description: A round shield of bound oak planks. It splinters under heavy blows, but it has a few blocks left in it.

Items.Name: Fur Cloak
Items.Description: Thick wolf pelt draped across the shoulders. More warmth than protection, but it dulls a blade's edge.

Items.Name: Iron Helm
Items.Description: A riveted iron skullcap dented from previous ownership. Fits poorly. Protects adequately.

Items.Name: Chainmail
Items.Description: Rings of iron woven into a mesh shirt. Heavy and jangling, but it turns aside most cuts.

Items.Name: Studded Armor
Items.Description: Leather reinforced with iron rivets across the chest and arms. Flexible enough to move in, strong enough to matter.

Items.Name: Iron Buckler
Items.Description: A compact iron shield worn on the forearm. Fast to position and reliable at turning a thrust.

Items.Name: Scale Mail
Items.Description: Overlapping iron scales sewn onto a leather backing. Moves like a living thing and deflects like stone.

Items.Name: Mithril Plate
Items.Description: Thin plates of silvery mithril shaped to the body. Weighs almost nothing. Stops almost everything.

Items.Name: Dragon Scale Armor
Items.Description: Scales stripped from a dead dragon and shaped into a cuirass. Fire doesn't touch you in this. Neither does much else.

Items.Name: Arcane Robe
Items.Description: Woven from enchanted thread, this robe shimmers faintly. Wards deflect blows and magic alike.

Items.Name: Obsidian Plate
Items.Description: Volcanic glass forged in a forge hotter than reason allows. It absorbs impact like nothing else.

Items.Name: Ring of Vitality
Items.Description: A plain copper ring set with a red stone. The stone pulses faintly with your heartbeat. You feel sturdier.

Items.Name: Amulet of the Sage
Items.Description: A silver pendant bearing an open eye. Wearing it sharpens your thoughts and deepens your arcane reserves.

Items.Name: Boots of Swiftness
Items.Description: Soft-soled boots stitched with speed glyphs. Your footsteps become nearly silent. Your reactions quicken.

Items.Name: Pendant of Resistance
Items.Description: A carved obsidian pendant on a dark cord. Dulls the edges of spells and blades that find you.

Items.Name: Iron Ore
Items.Description: Raw iron dragged out of the stone. Heavy and dull. Could be useful for a blacksmith.

Items.Name: Shadow Essence
Items.Description: Distilled shadow in a stoppered vial. Cold to the touch. Restores health when consumed — somehow.

Items.Name: Blood Vial
Items.Description: Vampire's blood, drawn at the kill. Bitter and warm. Works.

Items.Name: Lifedrinker
Items.Description: A blade that hungers for vitality. Each wound it opens pours life back into the wielder.

Items.Name: Frostbite Edge
Items.Description: The blade crackles with ice. Enemies it strikes may be locked in place by sudden cold.

Items.Name: Thunderstrike Maul
Items.Description: A massive hammer wreathed in crackling lightning. The killing blow echoes like thunder.

Items.Name: Aegis of the Immortal
Items.Description: Forged from divine alloy. When all seems lost, this aegis refuses to let the wearer die.

Items.Name: Shadowmeld Cloak
Items.Description: Woven from shadow itself. The first blow against a cloaked wearer finds only darkness.

Items.Name: Ironheart Plate
Items.Description: Plate mail etched with iron runes. Pain inflicted on the wearer echoes back to the attacker.

Items.Name: Ring of Haste
Items.Description: Time bends around the wearer's hand. Ability cooldowns melt away while it is worn.

Items.Name: Amulet of the Phoenix
Items.Description: Holds the spark of the undying bird. Once per run, it pulls the wearer back from death's edge.

Items.Name: Belt of the Titan
Items.Description: A thick belt of titan-hide that expands your capacity to haul the dungeon's riches.

Items.Name: Boots of the Windrunner
Items.Description: Light as a whisper. When flight is your only option, these boots give you one extra chance.

Items.Name: Cloak of Shadows
Items.Description: A dark cloak that helps you slip through the dungeon unseen. +5% dodge chance.

Items.Name: Ring of Warding
Items.Description: A ring of protective runes. At low HP it wards the wearer with a surge of defense.

Items.Name: Amulet of Clarity
Items.Description: +15 max mana. The gemstone whispers to focus the mind and reduce the cost of spells.

Items.Name: Gauntlets of Might
Items.Description: +6 ATK. Heavy gauntlets that add devastating power to each blow, though the bulk costs some guard.

Items.Name: Belt of Regeneration
Items.Description: A living belt woven with healing moss. Restores 3 HP at the start of each combat turn.

Items.Name: Cloak of the Magi
Items.Description: +20 max mana. A mage's cloak that channels arcane energy, reducing the cost of spells.

Items.Name: Rogue's Talisman
Items.Description: +3% dodge, +10% crit chance. A rogue's lucky charm, attuned to the art of the precise kill.

Items.Name: Warrior's Sigil
Items.Description: +8 DEF, +5 max HP. A warrior's emblem that fortifies the body against punishment.

Items.Name: Battlemaster's Cleaver
Items.Description: +14 ATK, +5% crit. A brutal cleaver forged for warriors who master the art of the decisive blow.

Items.Name: Vanguard's Bulwark
Items.Description: +16 DEF, +20 max HP. The vanguard's shield-like plate, built to take every blow the dungeon can deliver.

Items.Name: Stormcaller Staff
Items.Description: +12 ATK, +25 max mana. A crackling staff that channels storms through the caster's spells.

Items.Name: Arcanist's Mantle
Items.Description: +8 DEF, +30 max mana. A robe of layered arcane weave that bolsters both mind and body.

Items.Name: Assassin's Whisper
Items.Description: +16 ATK, +8% crit. A blade so perfectly balanced it seems to find weak points on its own.

Items.Name: Shadowstep Leathers
Items.Description: +10 DEF, +12% dodge. Supple leather armour stitched with shadow-thread for near-silent movement.

Items.Name: Panacea
Items.Description: A shimmering liquid that cures all ailments. Taste is indescribable, effect is not.

Items.Name: Cleansing Salve
Items.Description: A thick paste that draws poison and stops bleeding. Stings badly. Works.

Items.Name: Berserk Tonic
Items.Description: Rage in a bottle. +50% ATK, -30% DEF for 3 turns. Your hands shake, but your strikes do not.

Items.Name: Stone Skin Elixir
Items.Description: +40% DEF for 3 turns. Your skin hardens to granite. Blows that would stagger you feel distant.

Items.Name: Elixir of Swiftness
Items.Description: +25% ATK, +15% dodge for 4 turns. The world slows; you do not.

Items.Name: Goblin Ear
Items.Description: A goblin's severed ear, still warm. Smells of soot. Useful for certain alchemical preparations.

Items.Name: Skeleton Dust
Items.Description: Powdered bone scraped from a collapsed skeleton. Gritty. Has alchemical uses.

Items.Name: Troll Blood
Items.Description: Thick regenerative blood drawn from a troll. Vital ingredient in hardening tonics.

Items.Name: Wraith Essence
Items.Description: The distilled essence of a wraith, cold to the touch. Used in enchanting powerful items.

Items.Name: Dragon Scale
Items.Description: A single scale from a draconic creature, almost indestructible. Essential for legendary crafts.

Items.Name: Wyvern Fang
Items.Description: A serrated fang from a wyvern. Radiates a faint toxic heat. Coveted by weapon-smiths.

Items.Name: Soul Gem
Items.Description: A gem that trapped a soul in the moment of death. Pulses faintly. Essential for dark bindings.

Items.Name: Shadowstalker Hood
Items.Description: +8 DEF, +5% dodge. A hood of shadow-treated leather worn by masters of the dark arts.

Items.Name: Shadowstalker Garb
Items.Description: +10 DEF, +7% dodge. Body armour crafted for silence and speed above all else.

Items.Name: Shadowstalker Blades
Items.Description: +12 ATK. Twin blades balanced for the precise strikes of a shadowstalker.

Items.Name: Ironclad Helm
Items.Description: +10 max HP. A reinforced helm that protects the wearer's most vital organ.

Items.Name: Ironclad Chestplate
Items.Description: +16 DEF, +15 max HP. The centerpiece of the Ironclad set; a slab of walking fortress.

Items.Name: Ironclad Gauntlets
Items.Description: +8 ATK, +5 max HP. Iron-plated gauntlets that crush as much as they protect.

Items.Name: Arcanist's Crown
Items.Description: +20 max mana. A circlet of focused crystal that expands the wearer's mana capacity.

Items.Name: Arcanist's Robes
Items.Description: +8 DEF, +25 max mana. Robes threaded with arcane conduits for enhanced spellcasting.

Items.Name: Arcanist's Tome
Items.Description: +8 ATK, +20 max mana. A living tome whose spells strike with physical force.

Items.Name: BloodVial
Items.Description: A vial of dark, viscous blood. Used in dark alchemy.

Items.Name: WyvernFang
Items.Description: A curved fang from a Frost Wyvern. Still ice-cold to the touch.

Items.Name: FrostScaleArmor
Items.Description: Armour fashioned from wyvern scales. Grants immunity to Slow.

Items.Name: LichsCrown
Items.Description: The crown of a fallen lich. Channels necromantic power into the wearer.

Items.Name: StaffOfDomination
Items.Description: A jet-black staff crackling with domination magic. +12 ATK.

Items.Name: SoulGem
Items.Description: A gem pulsing with trapped life essence. Revives the holder at 25% HP once per run.

Items.Name: InfernalGreatsword
Items.Description: A massive blade wreathed in hellfire. +15 ATK. Applies Burn on hit.

Items.Name: DragonScale
Items.Description: A scale from the Infernal Dragon. Radiates intense heat.

Items.Name: Rodent Pelt
Items.Description: A mangy pelt. Worth a few coins at a merchant.

Items.Name: Dragonheart Elixir
Items.Description: A crimson draught distilled from dragon ichor. The heat of it never quite leaves you.

Items.Name: Bone Flute
Items.Description: A flute carved from the femur of something large. Playing it calls something back from the dark.

Items.Name: Crown of Ascension
Items.Description: The final crown. Whatever king wore this last did not survive the wearing.

Items.Name: Warrior's Sigil
Items.Description: A battle-worn sigil of the warrior orders. Those who carry it hit harder.

Items.Name: Rogue's Talisman
Items.Description: A talisman worn by those who live in the shadows. Light on your feet, light in your deeds.

Items.Name: Cloak of the Magi
Items.Description: Woven from spellthread and shadow. Favoured by those who keep their distance from the fighting.

Items.Name: Berserk Tonic
Items.Description: Tastes like copper and fury. Your hands shake after. That's fine. That's good.

Items.Name: Stone Skin Elixir
Items.Description: Drinking it makes you feel dense. Heavier. Harder. Like something that doesn't break easily.

Items.Name: Gauntlets of Might
Items.Description: Iron gauntlets reinforced with rune-carved plates. Your grip alone has become a weapon.

Items.Name: Belt of Regeneration
Items.Description: The buckle is inscribed with a serpent eating its own tail. Appropriate.

Items.Name: Elixir of Swiftness
Items.Description: Your limbs feel like water  fast, fluid, impossible to catch.

Items.Name: Panacea
Items.Description: Cures everything. Truly. Every wound, every poison, every curse. The aftertaste is extraordinary.
